price: 18. Alle waa og yahay kuwa idinka mid ah ee ka reeba (kuwa kale jihaadka Jidka Alle)11, iyo kuwa ku yidhaahda walaalahood: Noo kaalaya12; mana yimaadaan dagaalka in yar ma’ahee13.
arabic: ۞ قَدۡ يَعۡلَمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُعَوِّقِينَ مِنكُمۡ وَٱلۡقَآئِلِينَ لِإِخۡوَٰنِهِمۡ هَلُمَّ إِلَيۡنَاۖ وَلَا يَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡبَأۡسَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
footnotes:
11. Kuwa ka cesha dadka kale inay taageero siiyaan jihaadka oo garab istaagaan mujaahidiinta dagaalka.
 12. Halkii ay ku biiri lahaayeen.
 13. Markaasna waxay u baxaan ujeeddooyin kale sida aad maal heshaan, iwm.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qad yaʿlamu al-lahu al-muʿawiqīna minkum wal-qāilīna li-ikh'wānihim halumma ilaynā walā yatūna al-basa illā qalīlan
